formElement.label: Configuration:
formElement.documentation: Unique name for the plugin configuration.

formElement.label: Path to pmrep Utility:
formElement.documentation: Absolute or relative path to pmrep or pmrep.exe, e.g. $INFA_HOME/server/bin/pmrep.

formElement.label: Repository Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the Powercenter Repository Service, e.g. PowerCenterRepository.

formElement.label: Domain Name:
formElement.documentation: Domain name to connect to. Either Domain Name or Portal Host and Port must be provided.

formElement.label: Portal Host Name:
formElement.documentation: Hostname or IP address of the Powercenter portal, e.g. mypowercenter.

formElement.label: Portal Port Number:
formElement.documentation: Port number to connect to the repository.

formElement.label: Username and Password:
formElement.documentation: Username and password to used connect to Repository.

formElement.label: User Security Domain:
formElement.documentation: Used for LDAP authentication. The name of the security domain.

formElement.label: Log Level:
formElement.documentation: This option sets debug level for logs. If info is selected, only summary infornation will be show, for debug, there will be some debug information and for trace the whole requests and responses will be shown.
